meanings.definition: Showing a great deal of variety or difference
meanings.sent1: The forest is diverse with tall trees, colorful flowers, and different animals.
meanings.sent2: The diverse menu at the restaurant offers a wide range of dishes to choose from.
meanings.sent3: It was quite diverse to see a penguin dancing with a flamingo at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was as diverse as a rainbow, filled with all colors and styles.
meanings.sent5: The diverse landscape of the country included mountains, deserts, and beaches.

meanings.definition: Composed of distinct or unlike elements
meanings.sent1: The painting was diverse, featuring bold lines and soft pastel colors.
meanings.sent2: The team was diverse, made up of players from different countries and backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: It seemed diverse to have a cake with both chocolate and broccoli as ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His music was as diverse as a symphony, blending rock, jazz, and classical elements.
meanings.sent5: The garden was diverse, combining roses, cacti, and ferns in one beautiful space.

meanings.definition: Including people or things from different backgrounds or cultures
meanings.sent1: The school had a diverse student body, with students from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The festival was diverse, showcasing music and dances from various cultures.
meanings.sent3: It was diverse to see a cat and a dog sharing a meal at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of souvenirs was as diverse as a global market, representing many countries.
meanings.sent5: The city's cuisine was diverse, offering flavors from different parts of the world.
